body_html: I had the same problem before. It turns out that I've installed cuda 7.0 and cuda 8.0, nividia driver 367.57 on ubuntu 14.04. This issue happens when I forget to set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH to cuda 8.0.
body_text: I had the same problem before. It turns out that I've installed cuda 7.0 and cuda 8.0, nividia driver 367.57 on ubuntu 14.04. This issue happens when I forget to set the  LD_LIBRARY_PATH to cuda 8.0.
body: I had the same problem before. It turns out that I've installed cuda 7.0 and cuda 8.0, nividia driver 367.57 on ubuntu 14.04. This issue happens when I forget to set the  LD_LIBRARY_PATH to cuda 8.0.
